subtitleNullable: object detection dataset for facial features recognition
descriptionNullable:
Dataset Description: Object Detection Dataset for Facial Features
Overview:
This dataset is specifically designed for object detection tasks, focusing on facial features such as eyes, nose, and eyebrows. It is curated to be compatible with the YOLOv8 object detection framework and features annotations for six distinct classes related to facial characteristics.

Dataset Specifications:
Framework Compatibility: YOLO
Annotation Type: Pascal VOC
Classes:
Brown Eyes
Blue Eyes
Pointy Nose
Rounded Nose
Straight Eyebrows
Round Eyebrows
Data Augmentation:
To enhance the robustness and diversity of the dataset, various augmentation techniques have been applied to the images, including:

Flip: Horizontal and Vertical flips are applied.
Grayscale: Approximately 50% of the images have been converted to grayscale.
Exposure: Adjustments ranging between -21% and +21% have been made to the image exposure.
Data Split:
The dataset has been divided into three distinct subsets for training, validation, and testing purposes:

Training Set: 96% (2,691 Images)
Validation Set: 2% (51 Images)
Test Set: 2% (51 Images)
Usage:
Researchers and practitioners can utilize this dataset to develop and evaluate object detection models specifically tailored for facial feature recognition. The annotated classes and comprehensive augmentation techniques aim to facilitate the creation of robust and accurate models capable of identifying various facial characteristics.

Note:
Proper citation and adherence to licensing agreements are recommended when using this dataset for research.

By providing a detailed and well-structured dataset, this resource aims to contribute to advancements in object detection methodologies, particularly in the domain of facial feature recognition.
[paper](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10304905)
